scrollable

Description

Scrollable div 3d accellerated with touch functionality and callbacks for infinite scroll

Usage

as attribute
<ANY scrollable
     [on-top]="{promise}"
     [on-bottom]="{promise}">
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
[on-top]promise

optional callback function that execute when reaching top

[on-bottom]promise

optional callback function that execute when reaching bottom

Example

Source
